title: Design, synthesis, and exploration of antibacterial activity of 6H-1,2-oxazin-6-ones
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23828-23839
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04220D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Eleazar Alcántar-Zavala, Francisco Delgado-Vargas, Fabricio Marín-González, Gabriela López Angulo, Hugo Enrique Aguirre-Madrigal, Adrián Ochoa-Terán, Gibrán Rodríguez-Vega, Gerardo Aguirre-Hernández, Julio Montes-Avila
This study reports the in silico design of 30 6H-1,2-oxazin-6-ones against DHFR and PTC antimicrobial targets.
